posts.post_content: @TopRomen: No, you couldn't do that. The revealing of the items is part of the spell's resolution, and you can't do things in response to other things while spells resolve.
posts.html:
@TopRomen: No, you couldn't do that. The revealing of the items is part of the spell's resolution, and you can't do things in response to other things while spells resolve.
